import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import './CartItems.css' import { ShopContext } from '../../Context/ShopContext' import remove_icon from "../Assets/cart_cross_icon.png" import 'react-phone-number-input/style.css' import PhoneInput from 'react-phone-number-input' const CartItems = () => { const [phone, setPhone] = useState() const [dealMethod, setDealMethod] = useState('pickup') const {all_products,cartItems,addOneToCart,removeOneFromCart,removeAllFromCart,getTotalCartAmount,getTotalCartItems} = useContext(ShopContext) const changeHandler = (e) => { setDealMethod(e.target.value) } return (

Shopping Cart

{all_products.map((product)=>{ if(cartItems[product.id]>0){ return

{product.name}

${product.price}

{cartItems[product.id]}

${product.price*cartItems[product.id]}

{/*

${product.price*cartItems[product.id]}

*/} {/* {removeAllFromCart(product.id)}} alt="" /> */} {/* */}
{removeAllFromCart(product.id)}} alt="" />
} return null; })} {/*

{"Subtotal ("+getTotalCartItems()+" items): "} ${getTotalCartAmount()}

Your information

{dealMethod==="pickup"?
:
}
*/}
) } export default CartItems
